bibl.title: Gus Bendjus et al. v. Territory of Washington. Warrant
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p:
United States of America
Territory of Washington
Second Judicial District. ss
In the District Court holding terms at Montesano

Warrant
Territory of Washington
vs.
Gus Bendjus
Robert Stranglaud
Pete Peterson
Ben Fredrickson
Frank Nelson
Fred Stromberger
John Blending
Andrew Johnson
Leander Brown
John Saxon
John Thompson
Alex Agren
Thomas Jacobs
E. Emil
Andrew Anderson
Charles Burke

The President of the United States
To the Sheriff of Chehalis County

Greeting:
Whereas: Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Pete Peterson, Ben Fredrickson
Frank Nelson, Fred Stromberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agren, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emil, Andrew Anderson, Charles Burke: having been duly indicted in the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Montesano of the crime of Riot all of which appears to us of record.

Now, this is to command you, the said Sheriff to take the said Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Ben Fredrickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Stromberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agren, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emel, Andrew Anderson, Charles Bunke, and them the said Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Ben Fredrickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Stromberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agren, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emel, Andrew Anderson, Charles Burke, safely keep and have them forthwith in this Court, there to answer to said charge
and abide such further order as the Court may make in the premises — herein fail not.
Witness, the Hon. Frank Allyn judge of the said District Court and the Seal of said Court, this 16th day of Sept A.D. 1887.
